alert.note: Alert for Durham; Orange (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 23 at 7:27PM EDT until June 23 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHWESTERN DURHAM AND SOUTHERN ORANGE COUNTIES... At 727 PM EDT, While the rain has ended, local law enforcement has reported lingering flooding on a few roads in Chapel Hill. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Durham, Chapel Hill, Hillsborough, Carrboro, Eno River State Park, Efland and Jordan Lake. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
